entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 16 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
